Description: On VA-156 in the County of Prince George, at Benjamin Harrison Bridge, motorists can expect delays due to an incident. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 173.8 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north exit ramp narrows. Traffic backups are approximately 2.0 miles.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 50.7 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 86.5 in the County of Hanover, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south left shoulder, left lane, and left center lane are closed.

Description: On Rt. 1601 East in the County of Westmoreland, in the vicinity of Castle Dr; Rt. 1614N/S (Westmoreland County), motorists can expect delays due to an incident.
